IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.read_mail') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.read_mail GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.read_mail @mail_id dbo.id_t, @read_at SMALLDATETIME AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Mails SET read_at = @read_at WHERE @id = mail_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
